definition[0]: to keep thinking about something that you are worried or upset about
example[0]: Don’t sit at home brooding all day.
example[1]: There’s no point brooding over it – she’s gone.
definition[1]: if a bird broods, it sits on its eggs to make the young birds break out
definition[2]: a family of young birds all born at the same time
definition[3]: a family with a lot of children – used humorously
example[2]: Mary has a whole brood of grandchildren.
